mantra.text:
Namah Shivaya
chanting this mantra every day by sitting in a meditation and chant 108 times

hare krishna hare krishna krishna krishna hare hare 
hare rama Hare rama rama rama hare hare

meditation.text:
be as gradual as described above. Some people are able to stop thoughts, and control their mind very quickly. It depends on how determined or intent you are. It only takes a few minutes of having no thoughts for the mind to be stilled forever.
